title: bbsTaiwan
text: Hello, birder! Taiwan Breeding Bird Survey (BBS) conducts annual surveys, providing valuable systematic dataset studying species trends. bbsTaiwan package designed make accessing using precious Taiwan BBS data easier. article, aim demonstrate general applications can perform package. Enjoy coding birdies! 嗨嗨大家！台灣繁殖鳥類大調查（BBS）每年在臺灣各地進行系統性的調查，提供了一個珍貴的資料集，可以用於研究物種族群趨勢及其他鳥類研究主題的資料依據。bbsTaiwan package 的主要目的是讓研究者能更輕鬆地取得和使用臺灣 BBS 資料。以下將示範基本的 bbsTaiwan 使用方式，Enjoy！

what: Overview of BBS Surveying Effort 努力量分析
title: bbsTaiwan
text: diving bird occurrence data, ’s helpful first understand surveys conducted. includes knowing number sites, locations, number sites surveyed year. bbsTaiwan package provides several functions help get started understanding surveying effort. 在深入探索資料之前，先了解調查的時間和地點 (.e., 調查努力量) 是很有幫助的。這包含了解每年調查樣點的數量、它們的地理位置等等。bbsTaiwan 套件提供了幾個功能，讓你更快了解這些努力量的資訊。 see number sites surveyed year, can use bbs_history() function. function type argument two options: "plot" "table". Selecting "plot" display results ggplot graph, "table" show results tibble. 要查看每年調查的站點數量，你可以使用 bbs_history()這個 function， 該 function 有一個參數叫做 type，提供兩個選項："plot" 和 "table"。選擇 "plot" 將以 ggplot 圖表顯示結果，而 "table" 則會以 tibble 格式顯示結果。 Additionally, bbs_plotmap() function can used visualize distribution particular species. set argument NULL, display locations sites surveyed historically. 除此之外，若想要將特定物種的出現紀錄視覺化，可以使用 bbs_plotmap() 這個 function，如果將 target_species 參數設為 NULL，可以顯示歷史上所有樣站的位置。  prefer work tables see values directly, bbsTaiwan covered! can use bbs_history() function "table" option view number sites surveyed year tabular format. Additionally, can use bbs_sites() function access complete list sites plots along coordinates. 如果你是視覺派，覺得看到圖不夠，想要獲得真實的樣點數據，bbsTaiwan 也能滿足你的需求！你可以使用 bbs_history()，選擇 "table" 選項，以表格格式查看每年調查的站點數量。此外，你還可以使用 bbs_sites() 來獲取完整的樣點清單及座標。

what: Data Fetch for Target Species 物種出現紀錄
title: bbsTaiwan
text: Now come core function bbs_fetch(). function retrieves bird occurrence data GBIF summarizes understandable format. original data format GBIF, includes event occurrence data, designed machine-readable can difficult humans interpret. bbs_fetch() addresses performing following key steps: 現在我們來到核心功能 bbs_fetch()。該 function 將 GBIF 上面的資料總結成更易於理解的格式。GBIF 上的原始資料格式，包括事件和出現數據，是為機器可讀而設計，但對人類來說可能難以解釋。bbs_fetch() 通過以下步驟來讓資料更易於理解及分析： Join: Combines event, occurrence, measurementorfacts datasheets GBIF single cohesive dataset; 將鳥類出現的事件資料及樣點資訊和併成單一資料。 Filter: Retains observations specified species using target_species argument; 使用 target_species 參數保留指定物種的觀測資料。 Zero Fill: Converts implicit missing values explicit ones filling zeros trips target species observed. Specifically, plot visited particular year trip target species observed, species count show value 0 row; 將隱式缺失值轉換為明確的缺失值。用白話文來說，如果某個站點在特定年份及旅次有被調查，但沒有觀察到目標物種，則該行的物種計數將顯示為 0。 Finding hard choose specific target species want access entire dataset species? One great features bbs_fetch() can set target_species = "全部" retrieve entire unfiltered dataset. 想要取得所有物種的完整資料嗎？bbs_fetch() 有個特殊功能是，將 target_species 參數設置為 “全部”，就可以獲得包含所有調查過物種的資料。
code: # Here is a list of the 32 endemic bird species in Taiwan, where the species name can be used as the input of the function. #  # c("黑長尾雉", "白眉林鴝", "黃腹琉璃", "灰鷽", "小翼鶇", "白頭鶇", "赤腹山雀", "台灣竹雞", "繡眼畫眉", "台灣朱雀", "棕噪眉", "褐頭花翼", "台灣鷦眉", "小彎嘴", "大彎嘴", "台灣白喉噪眉", "台灣畫眉", "五色鳥", "台灣叢樹鶯", "火冠戴菊鳥", "烏頭翁", "台灣紫嘯鶇", "栗背林鴝", "黃山雀", "台灣藍鵲", "黃胸藪眉", "紋翼畫眉", "冠羽畫眉", "台灣噪眉", "白耳畫眉", "台灣山鷓鴣", "藍腹鷴")  bbs_fetch(target_species = "白頭翁") #> # A tibble: 53,874 × 16 #>     year month   day site   locationID decimalLatitude decimalLongitude weather #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  <chr>                <dbl>            <dbl> <chr>   #>  1  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  2  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  3  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  4  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  5  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  6  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  7  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  8  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. NA      #>  9  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. NA      #> 10  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. NA      #> # ℹ 53,864 more rows #> # ℹ 8 more variables: wind <chr>, habitat <chr>, scientificName <chr>, #> #   vernacularName <chr>, individualCount <dbl>, time_slot <chr>, #> #   distance <chr>, flock <chr> bbs_fetch(target_species = c("烏頭翁", "白頭翁")) #> # A tibble: 92,475 × 16 #>     year month   day site   locationID decimalLatitude decimalLongitude weather #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  <chr>                <dbl>            <dbl> <chr>   #>  1  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  2  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  3  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  4  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  5  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  6  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  7  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  8  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. NA      #>  9  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. NA      #> 10  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. NA      #> # ℹ 92,465 more rows #> # ℹ 8 more variables: wind <chr>, habitat <chr>, scientificName <chr>, #> #   vernacularName <chr>, individualCount <dbl>, time_slot <chr>, #> #   distance <chr>, flock <chr> bbs_fetch(target_species = "全部") #> # A tibble: 373,786 × 16 #>     year month   day site   locationID decimalLatitude decimalLongitude weather #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  <chr>                <dbl>            <dbl> <chr>   #>  1  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  2  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  3  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  4  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  5  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  6  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  7  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  8  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  9  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #> 10  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. what: Distribution of Target Species 物種分布
title: bbsTaiwan
text: Viewing distribution species (.e., sites certain species observed) straightforward. Simply use bbs_plotmap() function specify species interested . function can handle 5 species time prevent plot becoming cluttered. 視覺化物種分佈非常簡單。只需使用 bbs_plotmap() function 並指定你有興趣的物種。該 function 最多可以同時處理 5 種物種，以防止圖表變得過於雜亂。這裡示範白頭翁及烏頭翁的分布，可以看到兩物種分別佔據臺灣的西半部及東半部。

title: bbsTaiwan
text: satisfied default functionality provided bbsTaiwan? additional steps can take beyond package offers: 對 bbsTaiwan 提供的基礎功能不滿意嗎？如果你有更精確的研究目標，bbsTaiwan 還有其他方式可以滿足你： need summarize data customized way ready dive data wrangling, consider using raw data available GBIF repository. Working directly raw data allows fully understand data cleaning process create customized data structure tailored study objectives. 如果你需要以自己的方式來清理及統整資料，可以考慮使用 GBIF 的原始資料及。直接使用原始資料的好處是可以讓你全面理解資料清理的過程，並建造符合你研究目標的方法。 raw data Darwin Core format can accessed easily using names relevant spreadsheets. data objects automatically loaded install package. 你可以直接取得 GBIF 上以達爾文核心格式的資料，這些資料可以藉由以下 code 獲得(是不是超簡單)!

title: Authors and Citation
text: Sunny Tseng. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Tseng S (2024). bbsTaiwan: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval Analysis. R package version 1.0.0, https://github.com/SunnyTseng/bbsTaiwan, https://sunnytseng.github.io/bbsTaiwan/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {bbsTaiwan: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis},   author = {Sunny Tseng},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.0.0, https://github.com/SunnyTseng/bbsTaiwan},   url = {https://sunnytseng.github.io/bbsTaiwan/}, }

title: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis
text: goal bbsTaiwan streamline retrieval analysis Taiwan Breeding Bird Survey (BBS) data. package facilitates data access GBIF, Taiwan BBS data stored. data openly available GBIF, complex arrangement Darwin Core format can make challenging understand use, often requiring advanced data wrangling skills. bbsTaiwan package designed simplify process, making easier access utilize Taiwan BBS data. bbsTaiwan package 的目的是簡化臺灣繁殖鳥類大調查（BBS）資料的檢索和分析。該 package 可以即時取得存放在 GBIF 平台上的 BBS 資料，bbsTaiwan package 旨在簡化 BBS 的取得以及基本的分析、資料視覺化，讓使用者能更容易地檢索和利用臺灣 BBS 資料。 project supported rOpenSci Champions Program 2023-2024, Sunny Tseng main developer Eunseop Kim mentor. Jerome Ko kindly assisted interpreting accessing Taiwan BBS data. 此計畫由 rOpenSci Champions Program 2023-2024 資助，主要開發者為 Sunny Tseng，Eunseop Kim 協助開發，而 Jerome Ko 則代表 Taiwan BBS 官方，協助資料的取得及詮釋。

title: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis
text: v1.0.0 (Initial Release): Developed based GBIF Taiwan BBS dataset v1.9, covers data 2009 2016. v1.0.0（初始版本）：基於 GBIF 臺灣 BBS 資料集 v1.9 開發，包含 2009 年至 2016 年的資料。

title: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis
text: can install load development version bbsTaiwan Github : 在 R 輸入以下指令，可從 Github 安裝 bbsTaiwan 的開發版本：

title: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis
text: bbsTaiwan provides several intuitive imported datasets data processing functions. perform basic data retrieval visualization: bbsTaiwan 提供了幾個直觀的資料處理功能： bbs_history() examine number BBS sites surveyed year; 顯示每年調查的 BBS 站點數量 bbs_sites() return coordinates BBS sites; 顯示所有 BBS 樣點坐標 bbs_fetch() fetch cleaned version Taiwan BBS cccurrence data species; 取得經過清理的物種出現資料 bbs_plotmap() visualize species distribution across BBS sites; 視覺化物種分佈 bbs_translate() translate bird species’ Chinese common name scientific name; 將鳥類的中文俗名翻譯為學名 accessing raw Taiwan BBS dataset GBIF: 直接取得在 GBIF 上的臺灣 BBS 資料集： occurrence: times locations particular species recorded; 特定物種的出現時間和地點 event: protocols used, sample size, location ; 使用的調查方法、樣本數量以及各站點位置 measurementorfacts: additional information relating events; 與事件相關的附加信息 extendedmeasurementorfact: additional information relating taxon occurrences; 與物種出現相關的附加信息

title: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis
text: Get started 基本操作範例
code: library(bbsTaiwan)  ## Get data for species of interest bbs_fetch(c("白頭翁", "烏頭翁")) #> # A tibble: 92,475 × 16 #>     year month   day site   locationID decimalLatitude decimalLongitude weather #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  <chr>                <dbl>            <dbl> <chr>   #>  1  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. <NA>    #>  2  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. <NA>    #>  3  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. <NA>    #>  4  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. <NA>    #>  5  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. <NA>    #>  6  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. <NA>    #>  7  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. <NA>    #>  8  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. <NA>    #>  9  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. <NA>    #> 10  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. <NA>    #> # ℹ 92,465 more rows #> # ℹ 8 more variables: wind <chr>, habitat <chr>, scientificName <chr>, #> #   vernacularName <chr>, individualCount <dbl>, time_slot <chr>, #> #   distance <chr>, flock <chr>  ## Find the distribution/overlap of two species bbs_plotmap(c("白頭翁", "烏頭翁"))

what: bbsTaiwan: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis — bbsTaiwan-package
title: bbsTaiwan: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis — bbsTaiwan-package
text: goal bbsTaiwan streamline retrieval analysis Taiwan Breeding Bird Survey (BBS) data. package facilitates data access GBIF, Taiwan BBS data stored. data openly available GBIF, complex arrangement Darwin Core format can make challenging understand use, often requiring advanced data wrangling skills. bbsTaiwan package designed simplify process, making easier access utilize Taiwan BBS data.

title: bbsTaiwan: Streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) Data Retrieval and Analysis — bbsTaiwan-package
text: Maintainer: Sunny Tseng sunnyyctseng@gmail.com

what: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species — bbs_fetch
title: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species — bbs_fetch
text: function fetches occurrence data specified target species, utilizing event occurrence tables GBIF. fetched dataset undergoes following processing steps: Join: Combines event, occurrence, measurementorfacts datasheets GBIF single cohesive dataset. Filter: Retains observations specified species using target_species argument. entered Chinese common name linked scientific name bbs_translate. Zero Fill: Converts implicit missing values explicit ones filling zeros trips target species observed. Specifically, plot visited particular year trip target species observed, species count show value 0 row.

title: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species — bbs_fetch
Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species — bbs_fetch
text: target_species Character string specifying Chinese common name species interest. can accept single character string, target_species = "紅嘴黑鵯", vector, target_species = c("紅嘴黑鵯", "白耳畫眉").Use "全部" return species.

title: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species — bbs_fetch
text: tibble containing species occurrence data.

title: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species — bbs_fetch
code: # For single species data fetch bbs_fetch(target_species = "紅嘴黑鵯") #> # A tibble: 42,203 × 16 #>     year month   day site   locationID decimalLatitude decimalLongitude weather #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  <chr>                <dbl>            <dbl> <chr>   #>  1  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. The bird is not in the BBS species list #> ! 查無鳥名 #> NULL

what: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year — bbs_history
title: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year — bbs_history
text: function returns number sites surveyed year BBS Taiwan project. Sites mapped five regions: East, West, South, North, Mountain (elevation higher 1,000 m).

title: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year — bbs_history
Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year — bbs_history
text: type Character string specifying output format: either "table" "plot". Default value type = "plot"

title: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year — bbs_history
text: tibble ggplot showing number sites surveyed year across regions.

title: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year — bbs_history
code: # Return the number of sites in a table bbs_history(type = "table") #> # A tibble: 8 × 6 #>   year   East Mountain North  West Others #>   <chr> <int>    <int> <int> <int>  <int> #> 1 2009     31       41    24    52      0 #> 2 2010     30       26    25    57      2 #> 3 2011     24       37    55   134      3 #> 4 2012     31       47    88   142      3 #> 5 2013     28       43    80   138      2 #> 6 2014     36       46    91   118      2 #> 7 2015     36       49   112   143     12 #> 8 2016     38       42    98   157      2  # Return the number of sites in a bar chart bbs_history(type = "plot")

what: Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites — bbs_plotmap
title: Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites — bbs_plotmap
text: function visualizes sites surveyed breeding birds Taiwan, highlighting presence absence specific species. designed upon function bbs_fetch bbs_translate.

title: Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites — bbs_plotmap
Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites — bbs_plotmap
text: target_species Character string specifying scientific name species interest. can accept single character string, target_species = "紅嘴黑鵯", vector, target_species = c("紅嘴黑鵯", "白耳畫眉"). function can accept plotting 5 species one figure. Use NULL return map site distribution.

title: Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites — bbs_plotmap
text: ggplot object showing distribution map.

title: Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites — bbs_plotmap
code: # For single species distribution bbs_plotmap(target_species = "紅嘴黑鵯")   # For multiple species distribution bbs_plotmap(target_species = c("紅嘴黑鵯", "白耳畫眉"))   # Simply the distribution of the surveyed sites bbs_plotmap(target_species = NULL)

what: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites — bbs_sites
title: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites — bbs_sites
text: function returns coordinates BBS sites surveyed. arguments needed. coordinates reported using WGS84 projection system. Use terra::vect(geom = c("decimalLatitude", "decimalLongitude"), crs = "epsg:4326") transform table spatial object.

title: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites — bbs_sites
Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites — bbs_sites
text: tibble including coordinates BBS survey sites, WGS84.

title: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites — bbs_sites
text: source data comes event table GBIF dataset.

title: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites — bbs_sites
code: # Get the full list of BBS sites in a tibble bbs_sites() #> # A tibble: 4,160 × 6 #>    site   plot  locationID locality   decimalLatitude decimalLongitude #>    <chr>  <chr> <chr>      <chr>                <dbl>            <dbl> #>  1 A02-01 01    A02-01_01  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #>  2 A02-01 02    A02-01_02  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #>  3 A02-01 03    A02-01_03  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #>  4 A02-01 04    A02-01_04  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #>  5 A02-01 05    A02-01_05  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #>  6 A02-01 06    A02-01_06  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #>  7 A02-01 07    A02-01_07  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #>  8 A02-01 08    A02-01_08  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #>  9 A02-01 09    A02-01_09  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #> 10 A02-01 10    A02-01_10  台北縣瑞芳            25.1             122. #> # ℹ 4,150 more rows  # Transform BBS sites into a spatial object using terra package bbs_sites() |> terra::vect(geom = c("decimalLatitude", "decimalLongitude"), crs = "epsg:4326") #>  class       : SpatVector  #>  geometry    : points  #>  dimensions  : 4160, 4  (geometries, attributes) #>  extent      : 21.94431, 25.27016, 120.0673, 121.9298  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax) #>  coord. ref. : lon/lat WGS 84 (EPSG:4326)  #>  names       :   site  plot locationID   locality #>  type        :  <chr> <chr>      <chr>      <chr> #>  values      : A02-01    01  A02-01_01 台北縣瑞芳 #>                A02-01    02  A02-01_02 台北縣瑞芳 #>                A02-01    03  A02-01_03 台北縣瑞芳

what: Translate Bird Species' Chinese Common Name to Scientific Name — bbs_translate
title: Translate Bird Species' Chinese Common Name to Scientific Name — bbs_translate
text: function intended use bbs_fetch bbs_plotmap. function helps users find scientific names birds Chinese common names species found Taiwan.

title: Translate Bird Species' Chinese Common Name to Scientific Name — bbs_translate
Translate Bird Species' Chinese Common Name to Scientific Name — bbs_translate
text: target_species single character string vector character strings representing species' names Chinese.

title: Translate Bird Species' Chinese Common Name to Scientific Name — bbs_translate
text: vector bird species' scientific names. input species name included bird list Taiwan, NA returned. Please check typos.

title: Translate Bird Species' Chinese Common Name to Scientific Name — bbs_translate
code: # For a single species bbs_translate("白頭翁") #> [1] "Pycnonotus sinensis"  # For multiple species bbs_translate(target_species = c("烏頭翁", "白頭翁", "紅嘴黑鵯", "白耳畫眉")) #> [1] "Pycnonotus taivanus"      "Pycnonotus sinensis"      #> [3] "Hypsipetes leucocephalus" "Heterophasia auricularis"
